name: Johnny
bio: Hi, I'm Johnny! I run a boutique-style dog care experience out of my peaceful home, where your pup is treated like family and pampered like they are on vacation. After over 15 years of hands-on experience, including time as a vet assistant, I left the corporate world behind to do what I love full-time: caring for dogs.

Every stay is customized to your dog's personality and needs. Whether they are shy and sensitive or playful and high-energy, I create a calm, nurturing space where they can thrive. I'm home all day, which means your pup gets round-the-clock attention, comfort, and companionship. No crowded kennels, no rushed potty breaks, just a safe, cozy retreat designed for relaxation and joy.

And yes, I go the extra mile. From enrichment walks and cuddle time to optional extras like PAW-casso paintings and storytime, I make sure each dog feels safe, engaged, and loved while you're away. My place is kept sparkling clean, and I send tons of updates so you'll always know your pup is happy and in good hands.
homeEnvironment: Single-family home with open sight lines and soft gating to keep introductions calm
Dedicated nap dens, sanitized enrichment toys, and daily laundry service
Secure side yard play space plus on-leash sniffari walks through the neighborhood
On-site sitter 24/7 with hourly wellness checks during boarding weeks

name: Juli
tagline: Lakeview adventures from a calm Wildomar home
bio: I'm Juli, a lifelong dog nerd who traded agency life for lake breezes and full-time pet hospitality. My Wildomar home sits on a quiet cul-de-sac minutes from hiking trails, so pups get both a peaceful basecamp and plenty of adventure.

I specialize in confident-but-sensitive pups who need slow introductions and predictable routines. Morning sniffaris around the lake, shaded midday lounge sessions, and evening puzzle games are standard fare.
Communication is my love language: every stay includes twice-daily video recaps plus wellness notes summarizing meals, potty breaks, and enrichment moments.
homeEnvironment: Single-story ranch layout with no stairs and slip-free runners
Half-acre fenced yard featuring shade sails, splash trough, and agility tunnels
Resident senior Lab named Maple who helps demonstrate calm greetings
Backup power and Nest security so indoor temps and safety cams stay online
